positions.title: pastore
positions.shortDescription: Developed and deployed a comprehensive full-stack solution for product management, sales requests, and a storefront for a second-hand professional audio equipment retailer. Implemented production hosting using Nginx on Ubuntu.

positions.title: VOLT
positions.shortDescription: Engineered and deployed a robust full-stack solution for authentication and authorization, enabling a seamless non-KYC crypto card platform. Utilized Nginx on Ubuntu for production hosting.
